func_sig.description: Calculate the modulo of a number when divided by a given modulus.
func_sig.name: calculate_modulo

number.description: The number to calculate the modulo for.

func_sig.description: Calculate the greatest common divisor of two integers.
func_sig.name: gcd

func_sig.description: Calculate the remainder of a number when divided by a given divisor.
func_sig.name: calculate_remainder

func_sig.description: Convert a decimal number to a specified base and return its representation as a string.
func_sig.name: convert_to_base

base.description: The base to convert to (must be greater than 1).

func_sig.description: Sum the digits of a number in a given base representation.
func_sig.name: sum_of_digits_in_base

base.description: The base in which to sum the digits.

number.description: The decimal number to sum the digits of in the specified base.
